metadata.description: LLM has old return type but file was updated

original:
def get_users(db) -> list[User]:
    query = "SELECT * FROM users"
    rows = db.execute(query)
    return [User(**r) for r in rows]

llm_edit.old_text:
def get_users(db) -> List[User]:
    query = "SELECT * FROM users"
    rows = db.execute(query)
    return [User(**r) for r in rows]
